content: Awesome game i had so much fun with it
For 3 bucks it's more than worth it. I prefer funnier point and click games over serious ones and I even liked the bit of old school humor.
Im really enjoying this game. Tge vibe is like Day of the Tentical...
Amazing game very reminiscent of Monkey Island and I would love to see more of Cid's Adventures.
Old school fun. I wish there were more games like this.
Wonderful story and such a fun game! Really reminded me of Monkey Island, hope in a sequel!
Great
Awesome old-style adventure game.
Fun
Really enjoyed Monkey Island and I'm enjoying this too.
Good game but I have reached interlude 2 and can not go any futrher as the prompts at the side of the screen are no longer visible on my tablet. Disappointing.
Awesome game, but a lot of talking.
Great game
Fun game, well put together, the ending was frustrating
Hilarious game with fun plot. Some very confusing and random actions to solve but you don't want these games to be too easy! Sad when I finished it - a lot of fun üëçüèº

Great game!!! I'm a fan of all Curse of Monkey Island games. So, after many years waiting for a game similar in graphics and story line, I found this app, and it is wonderful. Congratulations to the designers. I am anxious to get more, adventure was short for me, but very well done.
Good storyline and graphics. Longer gameplay than expected for the price.
I wish there were more games like this. Love the funny commentary.
Nice point and click game which is like monkey island.
Fun game very challenging!

Not very good. Dialogue does not completely fit on tablet screen so vital information such as numbers you are trying to punch into a keypad are completely missing which makes game extremely difficult to play. I had to look at screnshots on a walkthrough to figure out what was supposed to be on the screen and where it was located to complete. Way too much dialogue. Lots of random wandering about. Game trying to be clever and witty, but it's not.
What a great, witty game towards the old classic point and click adventures. Make more, please. A sequel would be glorious. Well worth the buy.
Awesome game. The main character has a great personality.
Really enjoying the game
Silly doofy fun

Gah this game has so much potential but falls just that bit short. The puzzles are ok but a big part of the game is just fetching ingredients for different things. A little lazy on the developers front there more could have been done possibly another couple of locations in town and variation in puzzles. I get that it is trying to be monkey island but alas it doesnt meet that high bar.
It was awesome, make more lol

I love so much about this game. The character, the dialogue, the voice acting (though I usually play on mute and have to read the subtitles). The puzzles are great. They're challenging and you have to be careful not to miss anything important. The writing is clever, with strong character development, and at times meta (the menu conversation made me laugh). The developers are very personable and receptive and it's great to see passion going into indie games. I'll be looking for more from EL!
Fun
Loved it
Charming art style with enjoyable witty writing.
Very funny and fun. Super enjoyable and a bit hard.

I rarely get this excited about a game, but I just love this one. It reminds me of fun point-and-click adventure games from the 90s, the ones created by LucasArts or Sierra. Pretty graphics, simple controls, little Easter eggs in the dialogue and object interaction, and a tongue-in-cheek plot. I haven't gotten very far in it yet but I'm already sad that I'll be done playing it soon. Nice job guys!
Not like monkey island at all :(
Classic point and click adventure with humor, good dialogue, solvable puzzles üëå
Good game. Somewhat illogical but part of the charm. Great graphics and dialogue
Great game
Fun game

Loved it! Lots to do, nice and long, funny dialogue, good story line...for anyone complaining it's not as funny as it's trying to be, let's consider the type of humour then maybe you'll understand it's all PART of the humour. This game was wonderful. Period. Buy it, play it, enjoy it. :D
Cid is definitely a great demon of Darkestville. XD
Kooky, fun, exactly what you expect. Characters are well developed.
Great fun point click adventure hours of fun, puzzles towards the end make less sense.
It will not fit right on newest Galaxy tab 10.1 2020
Just like way back when if you lived the Monkey island series you'll love this game. I really do. It's sarcastic and cute and you play for hours.

It's reasonably entertaining but in places rather puerile. The puzzles are quite good but dialogue is not as funny as it tries to be. My main gripe is that the game save does not work properly. I don't like having to redo game progress.
Nice concept but the plot is too much of a parody and the game is too short.
Pretty awesome funny and cute the story is what I like and have been looking for thanks wow again awesome I also love the voices keep up the great work
There aren't many decent adventure games on mobile, but this is a really good one.
I truly enjoy this game. Shout out to threepwood. I would love to see more. Great game...
Fun entertaining
Great game, love the dialogue
Great ... fun to play üòä

This game reminds me alot of the Monkey Island series. They were my favourite. Thank you to the developers for similar memories. It is well worth the price. So, for those who love these sort of games (I do), you won't be disappointed.
Excellent.
Good game
Awesome game!! Loved the humor!! And I can't wait to play again to try and figure out the rest of the achievements!! I loved it!!

Overall, this was a great game. I had to deduct a star from the rating as the text went off screen, which wasn't a problem until the portal puzzle with menu options that were only single numbers, and as such, were completely off screen. So I had to guess their position relative to the text box, and it took several tries (you have to enter four digit numbers, so you have to figure out where each digit would be, starting with one at the top). That was quite frustrating. Otherwise, A+!
Great game, fun and good grafics and story
Classic
Really enjoyed this game
Great game. Good riddles. Totally remind me the curse of monkey island.

A visually interesting game that masks a rather tedious point & click puzzler that's not as funny as it thinks it is. The in/out UI inventory needs streamlining. Graphics & voice acting are great, but some of it's puzzles are dull & repetitive & found me in the opposite of 'can't put it down'. Finally gave up trying to open the door to hell section which was too much like the real thing & just as annoying. This was NOT FUN! It was just plain irritating. Could've been better. Wasn't.
Normally like this type of game but the puzzles are rubbish and needs constant looking up on internet. Too boring now so removed before completion
Love the game but annoyed with the fact that it doesnt always save your progress
Good game great humor and writing. Some times the puzzles were more just click everything with everything then anything that maked sense. Had to look up stuff out of frustration more than once.
One, it not the best experience ive had on a point and click adventure game, very well made considering its on mobile and there was such a small team, very underated good work guys!
I can't get past the the dog, I can close the door but don't matter what I do I can't put the rod in to keep it closed! Very frustrating!
This is the most ridiculously stupid bunch off rubbish I've ever paid for!!! Completely useless hint system, nil storyline and basically a go nowhere game. Counting my losses and uninstalling üëé
the best game i have played in a long time no bugs inthe game keep up the good work

Wow, what a nice and funny game. In the beginning I suspected to play an evil character, but soon it turned out to be much fun. The riddles are logical and can be solved. The story is great. Thanks guys üòÅüëç
Excellent!!! So happy I found this!!! More please!!!!üòÄüòç‚ô•Ô∏è

Looks like a fun game. Shame it doesn't entirely fit my tablet. Part is missing.. Fits my s9 perfectly since my tablet died. Great game! The best game on my phone so far. Looking forward to more games and would buy a new one from these in a heart beat.
Great game i wish there were more games like this. I can't say one bad thing qbout this game.
Good game
Funny, witty, with great voice acting and good puzzles. One of the best point and click adventures of the year
Excellent
Didnt save my progress. Game is too slow for me. And then it didnt save finally getting my pet back. And my house back. ü§¨ ü•∫ uninstalled
Excellent classic point and click gameplay, funny story and dialogues, great atmosphere. Longer than average games of this type. I don't see any cons for this game
Kept me entertained. Really good game with lovely graphics and funny dialogue. Just a little tricky; I had to cheat quite a bit and the solutions sometimes I would never have got on my own.
Ok game.
Brilliant game, i really enjoy playing it. Hope they make a Darkestville castle 2
Why can i only hear a cat
Really nice point and click. Runs smooth and is fun.
it looks good but, it's to wide and won't fit my tablet screen, so missing vital parts!! be aware if this issue, waste of ¬£5 its the delete button,

This is by far one of the BEST POINT & CLICK ADVENTURE games I've played from the Google play store! The graphics, dialogue & game play are ALL top notch. DEFINITELY worth the $$ for this download. You will not be disappointed I assure you! AWESOME job to the developers on this one. PLEASE PLEASE keep on coming up with more games like this bc you guys did an AMAZING job! Kudos to y'all!üòä
Terrific game! I love everything about it.

Complete Monkey Island rip-off. Even the music is so very similar. This shouldnt be a problem were it not fot being nowhere near as good. On my tablet the first words of all the text responses are missing which didn't help either.
AMAZING GAME! One of the best point and click games EVER! Please keep them coming. Thank you so much!
great Monkey Island vibe.. good dialogs, funny story.. definatelly worth the money
Game does not fit on samsung s3 tab screen. edges are cut off making gameplay difficult to impossible.
Great fun game. Good gags and a fun story.

I'm loving this game! The best Point & Click Adventure I've found on the app store. The story is interesting and funny. The puzzles are of varying difficulty (which I like - too many easy ones and there's no sense of accomplishment; too many hard ones and the game loses its flow). I've had to use a walkthrough on a couple of parts, but I'm guessing better players can get through on their own. I'm looking forward to the rest of the game!

i never leave reviews but this game deserves one.. its amazing! funny dialogue and smooth gameplay. only gripe is sometimes when choosing dialogue it chooses the wrong one even when i clearly press the right one. other than that its flawless. well done üëç
I love this game! graphics are awesome, game play is fun, and dialogue is funny! great job! if youre debating buying this, just do it! if you like escape type puzzle games you will like this.

If you remember Monkeys Island or other Lucas Arts adventure games, this is the game for you. I can't recommend this enough. The voice clips are a little rough, but the art style is great and the game is fun and challenging.

Brilliant. The voice acting for the lead character is perhaps the best I've heard in any adventure game. Very well-written and enjoyable, with great sense of humor. Puzzles are just challenging enough to keep you busy for a few days. My only concerns are the large number of typos in the English subtitles, and sometimes subtitles are awkwardly placed over the graphics, making them hard to read. Excellent game at a bargain price; please make another!
Halarious!! Not the best adventure I have ever played but it is great fun.
Fenomenal game! Dialogs, music and humor reminiscent of Monkey Island, not to mention the last chapter. Kudos to the devs. Hope for more of the same
Amazing Game! Just perfect. Loved it! Please make more!
Great game! Really funny, challenging and a good length.
Awesome game!
i cannot play this game , it freezes on opening everytime. ive tried cleaning up my phone etc but it didnt make. difference. How do i get a refund ?
I love the storyline. I got stuck at some places and wished there was a hint system involved, but it was a great game nonetheless. And yes, it was downright hilarious.

OMG this game was FAN-BLOOMING-TASTIC!!!! If you loved the 'Monkey Island' games, then you will REALLY enjoy this game. It was really long too, very well thought out and extremely funny. To the makers - thank you so much!!üëçüëèüëèüëè. I hope they have more games like this one. Well Done guys üòçüíóüíöüíúüíóüíõüíúüíó
great game!
This game is excellent, the characters are really funny. I love playing this.

Loved it! Great game although extremely difficult in parts, could do with a more helpful hint system. But a great format, graphics were fab, great characters and plenty of humour. Well done guys. Looking forward to anotherüëç
If you loved broken sword monkey island and the old school point and click adventures this is the game for you. A nice sized game and a dream to play. This is up there with the greats.
So great! Awesome in English too!!
fun FUN fUN Fun foon

This was absolutly the most awesome game. I loved the silly conversations and Cid's comments about differnt things. All the characters had well thought out personalitys. This story kept me interested and looking forward to what was next. It was so good I didn't want it to end but everything good must come to an end. I recommend buying this game it is worth it.
Love the game lots of fun, however I don't understand why the game is needing my location I also noticed my GPS icon in my notification bar stays on till I exit the game...... Seems kinda shady
Very amusing quest! However, there is a bug with inventory - I can't see the rightmost item, it is hidden behind an edge (at least on my phone, Galaxy S8+)
